package.description: This package contains drivers for Bosch BMA180 accelerometers. The BMA180 is a 3 axis sensor with configurable sensitivity ranges and event interrupts. As of 2/2012, the driver requires that the devices be connected to the host computer with a Sub20 interface device.
package.author: Lukas Marti, Nikhil Deshpande, Philip Roan (Maintained by Philip Roan)
